snippet.title: I, Hope Teaser Trailer Q1 2017
snippet.description: ++Good Games is proud to present Acronyx Animation Studio's "I, Hope".  This game is being donated to GameChanger Charity this spring with proceeds going to help kids suffering from life threatening illnesses
